flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
大昔に　絶滅したが　人間の　手で
化石から　復活させた　ポケモンの　一つ。
敵に　襲われると　硬い　カラに　隠れる。

Omanyte is one of the ancient and long-since-extinct Pokémon
that have been regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked
by an enemy, it withdraws itself inside its hard shell.

Omanyte è uno degli antichi Pokémon estinti, recentemente
rigenerati dall’uomo. In caso di aggressione da parte di
un nemico, si ritira all’interno della sua dura corazza.

Omanyte es uno de esos Pokémon ancestrales que se
extinguieron hace muchísimo tiempo y que la gente ha
recuperado a partir de fósiles. Si un enemigo le ataca, se
esconderá dentro de la dura concha que tiene.

Amonitas ist ein Pokémon, das lange Zeit ausgestorben war,
aber durch die Menschen aus Fossilien reproduziert wurde.
Wenn es von einem Feind angegriffen wird, zieht es sich in
sein hartes Gehäuse zurück.

Amonita est l’un des Pokémon disparus depuis longtemps
et qui furent ressuscités à partir de fossiles.
Lorsqu’il est attaqué par un ennemi, il se rétracte dans
sa coquille.

오랜 옛날에 멸종됐지만 인간의 손으로
화석에서 부활시킨 포켓몬 중 하나다.
적에게 습격당하면 단단한 껍질 속에 숨는다.

おおむかしに　ぜつめつしたが　にんげんの　てで
かせきから　ふっかつさせた　ポケモンの　ひとつ。
てきに　おそわれると　かたい　カラに　かくれる。

大昔に　絶滅したが　人間の　手で
化石から　復活させた　ポケモンの　一つ。
敵に　襲われると　硬い　カラに　隠れる。

Omanyte is one of the ancient and long-since-extinct Pokémon
that have been regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked
by an enemy, it withdraws itself inside its hard shell.

Omanyte è uno degli antichi Pokémon estinti, recentemente
rigenerati dall’uomo. In caso di aggressione da parte di
un nemico, si ritira all’interno della sua dura corazza.

Omanyte es uno de esos Pokémon ancestrales que se
extinguieron hace muchísimo tiempo y que la gente ha
recuperado a partir de fósiles. Si un enemigo le ataca, se
esconderá dentro de la dura concha que tiene.

Amonitas ist ein Pokémon, das lange Zeit ausgestorben war,
aber von den Menschen aus Fossilien reproduziert wurde.
Wenn es von einem Feind angegriffen wird, zieht es sich in
sein hartes Gehäuse zurück.

Amonita est l’un des Pokémon disparus depuis longtemps
et qui furent ressuscités à partir de fossiles.
Lorsqu’il est attaqué par un ennemi, il se rétracte dans
sa coquille.

오랜 옛날에 멸종됐지만 인간의 손으로
화석에서 부활시킨 포켓몬 중 하나다.
적에게 습격당하면 단단한 껍질 속에 숨는다.

おおむかしに　ぜつめつしたが　にんげんの　てで
かせきから　ふっかつさせた　ポケモンの　ひとつ。
てきに　おそわれると　かたい　カラに　かくれる。

古代の　化石から　復活。
殻の　中に　ためた　空気で
水中を　浮き沈みしていた。

Revived from an ancient fossil, this Pokémon uses
air stored in its shell to sink and rise in water.

Questo Pokémon, resuscitato da un antico fossile,
usa l’aria del guscio per immergersi.

Resucitado de un fósil, este Pokémon usa el aire de
su concha para sumergirse y emerger.

Es wurde aus einem Fossil reanimiert. Es nutzt
die Luftkammern in seiner Schale, um ab- und
aufzutauchen.

Recréé à partir d’un fossile, il utilise l’air dans sa
coquille pour s’enfoncer dans l’eau ou faire surface.

고대의 화석에서 부활했다.
껍질 안에 모은 공기로
수중에서 뜨고 가라앉기를 반복했다.

こだいの　かせきから　ふっかつ。
カラのなかに　ためた　くうきで
すいちゅうを　うきしずみしていた。

大昔　海に　住んでいた
古代ポケモン。１０本の　脚を
くねらせて　泳ぐ。

A prehistoric Pokémon that lived in the primordial
sea, it swims by twisting its 10 tentacles about.

Pokémon preistorico, che viveva nel mare primordiale.
Nuota facendo oscillare i suoi dieci tentacoli.

Pokémon prehistórico que vivió en el océano
primordial. Para nadar se valía de sus 10 tentáculos.

Ein prähistorisches Pokémon, das zur Urzeit im
Wasser lebte. Es schwimmt, indem es seine
zehn Tentakel bewegt.

Un Pokémon préhistorique qui vivait dans les
profondeurs marines. Il se déplace en agitant ses 10
tentacules.

먼 옛날 바다에서 살고 있던
고대 포켓몬. 10개의 다리를
구불거리며 헤엄친다.

おおむかし　うみに　すんでいた
こだい　ポケモン。１０ぽんの　あしを
くねらせて　およぐ。

A Pokémon that was resurrected
from a fossil using modern science.
It swam in ancient seas.

A Pokémon that was resurrected
from a fossil using modern science.
It swam in ancient seas.

A Pokémon that was resurrected
from a fossil using modern science.
It swam in ancient seas.

Un Pokémon ramené à la vie par
la science à partir d’un fossile. Il
peuplait autrefois les mers.

A Pokémon that was resurrected
from a fossil using modern science.
It swam in ancient seas.

Un Pokémon ramené à la vie par
la science à partir d’un fossile. Il
peuplait autrefois les mers.

This Pokémon from ancient times is
said to have navigated the sea by
adeptly twisting its 10 tentacles.

Revived from an ancient fossil,
this Pokémon uses air stored in its
shell to sink and rise in water.

A Pokémon that was resurrected
from a fossil using modern science.
It swam in ancient seas.

A Pokémon that was resurrected
from a fossil using modern science.
It swam in ancient seas.

A Pokémon that was resurrected
from a fossil using modern science.
It swam in ancient seas.

Although long extinct, in rare cases, it
can be genetically regenerated from
fossils.

A prehistoric POKéMON that lived in the
primordial sea, it swims by twisting its
10 tentacles about.

One of the ancient and long-since-extinct
POKéMON that have been regenerated
from fossils by humans. If attacked,
it withdraws into its hard shell.

OMANYTE is one of the ancient and long-
since-extinct POKéMON that have been
regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked by an enemy, it withdraws
itself inside its hard shell.

OMANYTE is one of the ancient and long-
since-extinct POKéMON that have been
regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked by an enemy, it withdraws
itself inside its hard shell.

In prehistoric
times, it swam on
the sea floor, eating plankton.
Its fossils are
sometimes found.

This POKéMON from
ancient times is
said to have navi­ gated the sea by
adeptly twisting
its 10 tentacles.

Revived from an
ancient fossil,
this POKéMON uses air stored in its
shell to sink and
rise in water.

An ancient POKéMON
that was recovered
from a fossil. It swims by cleverly
twisting its 10
tentacles about.

Although long
extinct, in rare
cases, it can be genetically
resurrected from
fossils.

Although long
extinct, in rare
